sentences.english: Rich state, simple and honest, giving and peaceful atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 富態，憨厚，給人以祥和的氣氛。

sentences.english: Potbellied , middleaged man still can be used " rich voice " cover up a scandal, where is woman?
sentences.chinese: 大腹便便，中年男人還可以用“富態”遮羞，女人呢？

sentences.english: Just like most of the Chinese people believe, "The Fat" is "Happiness.
sentences.chinese: 就像大多數的中國人所認爲的，“富態”是“福”。

sentences.english: Met up with his mother many times, a well coiffed lady.
sentences.chinese: 曾多次見過他的母親，一個打扮得頗富態的女人。

sentences.english: She is too plump to fit into this dress.
sentences.chinese: 她太富態了，穿不下這件衣服。
